The photograph of U: S. Sen. Lindsey Graham with far-right politician Geert Wilders was widely shared on social media in March 2021, along with a caption claiming it was taken recently.
The photograph was actually taken in Sep: an annual international economic conference in Italy, as confirmed by a screenshot of the original tweet posted by Wilders.
Kevin Bishop: a spokesperson for Graham, verified the authenticity of the photograph and confirmed that Graham took pictures with several people at the forum, including Wilders.
The photograph does not imply that Graha: views, and being photographed together does not automatically indicate agreement with someone's beliefs.
